Description:
This is FABULOUS alone, topped with fruit of any kind or as a frosting on cake. It is fast to make at the last minute. Use more of less lime according to taste.

Ingredients:
 - Juice of 4 limes
 - 400 ml (1 pint (473 ml)) heavy whipping cream
 - 397 grams (14 ounces) condensed milk
 - 1 tablespoon powdered sugar

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, beat the cream with a tablespoon powdered sugar until stiff peaks form.

2. Add the condensed milk and fold gently with a spatula. Pour the lime juice and fold gently until the cream begins to thicken slightly.

3. Pour the mousse into individual bowls and refrigerate about 2 hours.

4. Remove the mousse from the fridge, garnish with lime zest and serve.
